summary: Tested Prime Group Feature and Event Time Editing. Backend: 8/8 tests passed. Frontend: All UI elements verified working. One issue found: Dashboard loads prime group data but doesn't render a dedicated PrimeGroupCard component.

integration_issues.issue: Dashboard.js loads primeGroup and primeGroupEvent state (lines 101-102, 150-197) but does NOT render a dedicated PrimeGroupCard component. The prime group's events appear in the 'Upcoming Group Events' section, but there's no dedicated 'My Prime Group' card as mentioned in the feature request.
affected_selectors: primeGroup state variable unused in render

action_items: Add PrimeGroupCard component to Dashboard.js that displays the prime group details (name, description, member count) and next upcoming event when primeGroup state is set
critical_code_review_comments: Dashboard.js lines 101-102: primeGroup and primeGroupEvent state variables are set but never rendered in the JSX. The loadPrimeGroup function (lines 150-197) correctly fetches the data but there's no UI component to display it.

success_rate.frontend: 95% (Prime Group star button works, Event editing works, but PrimeGroupCard not rendered)

prime_group_set_via_star_button.description: Clicking star button on Groups page sets prime_group_id via PUT /api/users/profile
prime_group_set_via_star_button.evidence: UI shows filled star (‚≠ê) after clicking, backend confirms prime_group_id is set

prime_group_unset_via_star_button.description: Clicking filled star button unsets prime_group_id
prime_group_unset_via_star_button.evidence: Backend confirms prime_group_id is null after unsetting

prime_group_validation.description: Setting prime_group_id to a group user is not a member of returns 400 error
prime_group_validation.evidence: API returns 'You must be a member of the group to set it as prime'

prime_group_display_on_dashboard.description: Dashboard loads prime group data but doesn't render dedicated PrimeGroupCard
prime_group_display_on_dashboard.evidence: primeGroup state is set but not used in JSX render. Events from prime group appear in 'Upcoming Group Events' section.

event_creation.description: Group members can create events with title, description, date/time, and location

event_editing_by_creator.description: Event creator can edit title, description, date/time, and location via PUT endpoint
event_editing_by_creator.evidence: UI shows Edit Event form, changes persist to backend

event_editing_authorization.evidence: API returns 'Only the event creator can edit this event'

test_credentials.note: Test users created and cleaned up during testing

seed_data_creation: Test users, sessions, groups, and events created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Prime Group feature backend is fully working. Frontend Groups.js correctly syncs prime_group_id with backend. Dashboard.js loads prime group data but needs a PrimeGroupCard component to display it. Event editing works end-to-end with proper authorization checks.

mocked_apis.note: All APIs are real - no mocking
